skills_generic_df.Description: Be exhaustive and complete. Provide generic and basic names for the 'skill' values from the skills\_df attribute. For example, if the skill is 'MySQL', the generic skill is 'SQL'; If the skill is GCP, the generic skill is 'cloud platform'; Programming is the generic skill for Pythin. Aim for 100% certainty for a generic skill derivation.
skills_generic_df.Name: skills_generic_df
skills_generic_df.Specification:
List of dictionaries. Dictionary attributes:
-- skill: eg, MySQL
-- skill\_generic: eg, ["SQL", "database", "relational database"]
-- score: highest score based on a scored skill

skills_listed_df.Description: Be exhaustive and complete.  List all the technical and professional skills that only appear as part of a list. Use the resume/ interview evaluations/ code evaluations. Provide information on the source for the information. Note: Only include an item IF we actually have content originating from that source.
skills_listed_df.Name: skills_listed_df
skills_listed_df.Specification:
List of dictionaries. Dictionary attributes:
-- skill: eg, ETL
-- technologies: eg, ["Alteryx", "Informatica"]
-- score: 5

entity_id.Description: The person's name as it appears in the resume.
entity_id.Name: entity_id

skills_alt_names_df.Description:
Be exhaustive and complete. Provide alternate names for the 'skill' values from the skills\_df attribute. For example, if the skill is 'Kubernetes', an alt name is 'K8s'; GCP and Google Cloud  are the same thing. Use the same values for the other dictionary attributes. 
LABELS AND SCORES
==================
Use labels to describe the quality of the information. 
-- verified: (if the evaluation was performed on the basis of a code base evaluation or was validated in an interview evaluation). score:10
-- verifiable: if there's a URL or certificate id present and the certificate in itself demonstrates the skill. score: 10 
-- detailed: (if referenced in the context of a role or project). score: 7
-- listed: if the skill is part of a list but for which there is no context. score:5

note: Only include an item in source IF we actually have content originating from that source.
skills_alt_names_df.Name: skills_alt_names_df
skills_alt_names_df.Specification:
List of dictionaries. Dictionary attributes:
-- skill: eg, Kubernetes
-- skill\_alt: ["K8s"]

preferred_name.Description: The person's name as it appears in the resume.
preferred_name.Name: preferred_name

_meta_cant_be_evaluated_df.Description: Stores a list of dictionaries of fields (Name) that cannot be evaluated
_meta_cant_be_evaluated_df.Name: _meta_cant_be_evaluated_df

skills_non_technical_df.Description: Be exhaustive and complete.  List all the technical, professional, language, leadership and other skills for which there's no specific technological tool mentioned. Note: Only include an item IF we actually have content originating from that source.
skills_non_technical_df.Name: skills_non_technical_df
skills_non_technical_df.embedded_schema:
skill: Text
source: Text
source_detail: List
skills_non_technical_df.Specification:
List of dictionaries. Dictionary attributes:
-- skill:
-- source: of(resume, interview evaluation, code evaluation, etc) 
-- source\_detail: eg, resume section (work experience, project, achievement section, skill list, etc'

skills_verified_df.Description: Be exhaustive and complete. List all the technical and professional skills for which there's proof; eg, certificate, code that was evaluated, degreed program. Note: Only include an item IF we actually have content originating from that source.
skills_verified_df.Name: skills_verified_df
skills_verified_df.Specification:
List of dictionaries. Dictionary attributes:
-- skill: eg, ETL
-- technologies: eg, ["Alteryx", "Informatica"]
-- score: 10

skills_detailed_df.Description: Be exhaustive. List all the skills for which there's a context provided  (if referenced in the context of a role or project, for example). Note: Only include an item in source IF we actually have content originating from that source.
skills_detailed_df.Name: skills_detailed_df
skills_detailed_df.embedded_schema:
skill: Text
technologies: List
score: Integer
skills_detailed_df.Specification:
List of dictionaries. Dictionary attributes:
-- skill: eg, ETL
-- technologies: eg, ["Alteryx", "Informatica"]
-- score: 7
